channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by INSA and YouGov for Bild, 29–31 March 2018 – Seat Projections
item.description:
• CDU (EPP): 23–28 seats
  • SPD (S&D): 15–19 seats
  • Alternative für Deutschland (EFDD): 12–16 seats
  • FDP (ALDE): 8–11 seats
  • DIE LINKE (GUE/NGL): 10–13 seats
  • BÜNDNIS 90/DIE GRÜNEN (Greens/EFA): 8–11 seats
  • CSU (EPP): 4–7 seats

  • BÜNDNIS 90/DIE GRÜNEN (Greens/EFA): 9–12 seats
  • CSU (EPP): 6–8 seats
